item.description:
For those taking public transportation, follow the map to walk to Russell Field via the path from Alewife T Station, OR take the 83 bus from either Porter or Central Square. If you are taking the T, be sure to go LEFT after you get off the train. That particular exit will say "Russell field" and should dump you on the path to Russell (A 5 min walk, tops!)

For those driving, park in the public parking lot alongside the playing field.
item.why: It will probably be cold, but the field is TURF. You can wear spikes but don't need to for this surface. It was a lot of fun to play here last week, and we're going to continue. We hope to see you Saturday.
item.name: Flag Football at Russell Field-SAT-2PM
